title: Make Zed Great Again
body: Yea so i have a proposal, idk if this is gonna get liked or not but. Just like what Riot did with Katarina and her Q so it no longer deal lesser damage when it bounces, could we possibly do the same for Zed and his Q? Just thinking out loud. Pls let me know what you think{{champion:238}}

replies.body: Can we nerf Zed again and make QSS cleanse his ult like it used to so he has clear counter play.
TBH i Agree with the Whole Qss thing but nerfing zed would just be out of the question as zed isn't as strong by a long as shot as he was back then

His Q does less damage on the second target and onwards.
His second shuriken does less damage than the first.

Read the skill description.
I did, now Katarina's Q does the same damage to all targets her Q bounces onto instead of the "Less damage than the first", Can't we do the same for Zed?
